title: Zipp 3ZERO MOTO Wheels get updated with ZM2 hubs featuring 12 pawls & 132 POE
content:
Zipp’s 3ZERO MOTO wheels are getting faster. Well, at least in terms of engagement. Upgrading from the ZM1 hubs that were a part of the build for the initial launch, the wheels will now ship with the new ZM2 hubs which feature 12 pawls. According to Zipp, the new hubs are engineered in Germany and include […]

The post Zipp 3ZERO MOTO Wheels get updated with ZM2 hubs featuring 12 pawls & 132 POE appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Zach Overholt
